body: {"table": "documents", "columns": [{"name": "id", "type": "character varying", "nullable": false}, {"name": "title", "type": "character varying", "nullable": true}, {"name": "section", "type": "character varying", "nullable": true}, {"name": "content", "type": "text", "nullable": true}, {"name": "source", "type": "character varying", "nullable": true}, {"name": "date_published", "type": "date", "nullable": true}, {"name": "date_scraped", "type": "timestamp without time zone", "nullable": true}, {"name": "granularity", "type": "character varying", "nullable": true}, {"name": "embedding", "type": "USER-DEFINED", "nullable": true}], "indexes": [{"name": "documents_embedding_ivf", "definition": "CREATE INDEX documents_embedding_ivf ON public.documents USING ivfflat (embedding vector_cosine_ops) WITH (lists='100')"}, {"name": "documents_pkey", "definition": "CREATE UNIQUE INDEX documents_pkey ON public.documents USING btree (id)"}, {"name": "documents_source_idx", "definition": "CREATE INDEX documents_source_idx ON public.documents USING btree (source)"}]}
